website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe, high-end serger designed to streamline the sewing process.
pros: Besides adjustable differential feed and automatic rolled hemming, this luxury machine offers push button air threading
User also has the option to deactivate the upper knife
cons: The cost of this machine makes it suitable for the most serious sewing enthusiasts

customer_reviews.title: Looper cover jammed instantly
customer_reviews.text: After threading the lower loopers for the first time, the cover would not close completely. It kept springing back open, and there was a clicking noise when swinging it. Asked for help from Juki, and they said check with the dealer. Asked for help from Universal Sewing Supply, and they said go through Amazon. Amazon's solution is 'return it for a replacement.' I returned it for a refund. I'll be buying a Brother from a local dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to thread than other sergers
customer_reviews.text: Some difficulty getting foot to stay in place. If not snapped in properly the needles break when you try to sew. It appears to be OK but if not perfect , you're in for more needle purchasing . A sturdier foot with a better connection would solve this problem. This is my only disappointment. Other than that, I love this new machine.
customer_reviews.author: harpgal

customer_reviews.title: A dream come true
customer_reviews.text: The self threading serger is a dream come true. The old systems were a big problem. This machine is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Serger!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is rad. The automatic threader is worth all the money. The instructional DVD is very cool. This is an awesome upgrade from my brother machine.
customer_reviews.author: Shanster84

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MACHINE! Thrilled with this serger
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING MACHINE! Thrilled with this serger. Setup was a breeze. The easiest threading - between air threader for loopers + the right/left needles. Air threader is the best feature, however, not mentioned much in product description is how easy it is to thread the right/left needles - at the point of threading the needle eye, there is this 'clip' you push the thread into and lift the lever and the needle is threading. No squinting, magnifier glass,no frustration. Only thing is that CD/DVD that came with machine didn't auto run in my computer, but there is same thing on YouTube so was no issue. This is a MUST for any serious sewer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: and arrived on time and in perfect condition. This is really an impressive machine
customer_reviews.text: The serger was shipped promptly, and arrived on time and in perfect condition. This is really an impressive machine. It threaded easily and worked flawlessly. Also, it was amazingly smooth and quiet. This is not a cheap machine, but you absolutely get everything you pay for. I expect it to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaMike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My eyesight is not great and this serger is the one for me. Push button and it is threaded!
customer_reviews.author: Janet E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has hinted for a serger for some time now. Whenever I would try to get her to pick one out, she wouldn't. (She is very money conscious). I finally did my research and picked this one. She absolutely loves it! Her eyes are not what they use to be and the self threading feature and the needle threader are amazing! We have a new granddaughter and my wife is already busy making her some nice dresses. The serger works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: digitalman1961

customer_reviews.title: Having used a serger for many years, but putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Having used a serger for many years, but putting off having to thread it, because of the difficulty, my Juki Mo-1000 is a dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Bingel

customer_reviews.title: Air doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Returned becauseceould not do the air right. Thats the reason I ordered it in tgevvfirstbbplace.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah whitwell

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Great serger easy to use ... beautiful stitches. Easy rolled hem
customer_reviews.author: Anita C

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great 3rd party seller
customer_reviews.text: Third party seller was awesome to deal with. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Wayman

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: all I can say is WHAT A MACHINE. Love this serger. Easy to use and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sue G

customer_reviews.title: JUKI MO-1000 Serger - many good features!
customer_reviews.text: Just received My Juki MO-1000 serger and am pleased as punch. It has a needle threader AND the jet air assisted threading for the loopers. Also the scrap catcher is nice. I bought the OTHER serger with air assist and no needle threader many years ago for $1800.00 floor model. And this costs me at least $500.00 less. Todays price on the OTHER serger is $2100.00 so the savings is considerable. I was told that Juki made the OTHER serger machines for them. Their engineers designed it but Juki manufactured them since the OTHER didn't have a factory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Performs well takes a little time to learn how to adjust if changing weight and types of fabrics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to thread, quiet, thread in any order, worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: My first one went missing during shipping so i had to wait an extra 10 days but it was worth it! I have 2 kinds of arthritis plus repetitive injuries and during the last few years threading has become difficult. I love the air system but needed to watch the videos a couple of times to get all the levers right. I also found it faster to thread the needles without using the threader. Plus this machine is quieter that my previous sergers. Love be able to thread in any order when I need to change color. In only two days, I have caught up on my projects faster.
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have gotten it threaded and did some ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good . I have gotten it threaded and did some practice runs and it seems to work great. I am busy with getting income taxes done (work) but looking forwarding to catching up on sewing soon. I have so many ideas! and this is going to help tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Shiraiwa

customer_reviews.title: I didn't buy it from Amazon but I love mine. Had it since the end of October
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy it from Amazon but I love mine. Had it since the end of October. I used to have a Brother 1034d and couldn't get past the threading. The jet air threaders work wonders with serger thread and maxi stretch thread (like wooly nylon). I compared it to the Babylock with jet air threading and this beats theirs in price.
customer_reviews.author: Student of Life

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was ahead of time. Hope to get to ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was ahead of time. Hope to get to work on it today. Looking forward to using the serger. Read the reviews and talked with other sewers/quilters who had this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Frances D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: love the Juki mo 1000
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine from a dealer so I got 5 free lessons on how it works. I love this machine and in the past week I was able to take a serger class from JUKI which was fun and learned different projects I can do. Learned how to make a table runner with a flat lock stitch.. Machine is a little pricey but well worth every penny and love the fact that it is easy to thread.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great serger
customer_reviews.text: The serger is very easy to thread and use. There is also great instructional video.
customer_reviews.author: e. angela branch

customer_reviews.title: My 1st seger
customer_reviews.text: I love this serger. I was intimidated by treading the others but wanted one so bad. I purchased mines from a sewing store. They give free lessons for a year and will clean your machine for free. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MissKim333

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first serger. I had never used one before. But this machine makes me look like I know what I'm doing. Super easy to thread and use. I would highly recommend it, and also recommend a couple of YouTube videos about the machine. One is by Crafty Gemini, and the other by an Australian woman. They both show good closeups of how to use the serger. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Returns and exchanges end after only 1 month?
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said to buy a Juki. I finally bought a Juki. I’ve had it for 2 months and it broke. Broke and I’m not eligible for a return.. after two months. This is a super expensive machine, so I thought it would be everything I dreamed of. I sew knits primarily, nothing major. All light-mid weight stretch Fabrics. I’m really disappointed in the return on this.
customer_reviews.author: Sab

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third serger I have owned; each time I have upgraded to a better model. The Juki MO1000 is a dream to thread; no more fears or frustration when changing thread colors. The air threading is wonderful and easy to use and the stitch quality is great. The machine also maintains that stitch quality throughout the stitching process. I've owned this for about 2 months and have no complaints. My only frustration is the manual. Instead of separate sections for different languages, Juki has all languages together in each chapter making the manual less user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Air threader not great
customer_reviews.text: The machine is nice however getting the air threader to work is something else. Can't seem to get it to work all the time. Needs improvement. I thought it would be perfect because my eyesight is not as good as it use to be, but did not solve my problem.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA A SEWELL

customer_reviews.title: Juku MO-1000 serger
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid to thread this the first time, but the DVD made it so easy. I am in love with this serger. And the seller was very good about getting it to be quickly and in perfect condition. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great serger and price was reduced when I purchased it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great serger and price was reduced when I purchased it on Amazon. Had a bit of a problem threading the sewing needles, but figured it out with YouTube videos. The instructions manual and DVD were worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi613

customer_reviews.title: Great serger
customer_reviews.text: This is my first serger and very user friendly. I was using it pretty much straight from the box. The air threading is wonderful. All in all a top notch serger. Haven't had an ounce of trouble with it and have sewn several knit garments already. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: My new amazing miracle maker
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, in great condition. Written instruction book, along with video. Very sturdy, quite heavy. Very happy with what I have seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BMW of Sergers
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in less than 24 hours! Threaded and in use 20minutes after that! My first Juki and I LOVE IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to enjoy seeing again!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and kind to my aging eyes and arthritic hands. Sees nicely and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this serger! Once you have a self-threading machine--you will never go back to manually threading machines!
customer_reviews.author: Salsalover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to thread & use. Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is like my old babyloc very easy to use I love it
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on schedule. So many improvements since my last serger purchased 13 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted a serger. I did the research. This is what I bought. She loves it, and I'd buy it again. Here's why: 1. Wasn't sure the air feed was worth a $300 adder, but it is. 2. Amazon was $300 cheaper than local store. I love supporting locals, and went there to see what they could do for me, but that's 25% difference. 3. Janome is a maintenance hog, and makes you say bad words. 4. Babyloc is good, just more expensive for the same basic features, and is made in the Brother factory. 5. You don't need the MO-1500 with electronic adjust tension. Just more electronic crap to break (and I'm an electrical engineer).
customer_reviews.author: W. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: sews like a dream and threads even better
customer_reviews.text: There i nothing I do not like about this Juki, I love the ease and quietness of using it. My first serger was a Juki but I wirn it out and by that time ,self threading machines were on the market so I got one, then another and now I have the 3rd one sitting aside doing as the other 2 did, NOT WORK!!!!!! when I saw this machine it was back to Juki and day one it worked like a charm. Never had a better serger in almost 30 yrs. I am a dress maker and sew a lot.. Just love this serger,
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy cutting blade
customer_reviews.text: The serger is easy to thread and use but the "ultra hard" lower cutting blade snapped in half after only a few weeks of use, which was disappointing and inconvenient. I accidentally missed a pin in the piece I was sewing which the cutting blade hit, which caused the problem. But the pin didn't break the needle, just the lower cutting blade. I'll be more careful about pins in future, but I do a lot of serging and would have preferred a sturdier machine.
customer_reviews.author: ljbd

product_meta.title: Juki MO-1000 Serger, Push Button Jet Air Looper Threader,purple
product_meta.description: The Juki MO-1000 Serger threads like a breeze with the all new air supported threading technology! It even threads the needle with an automatic needle threader! Key Features- ADJUSTABLE DIFFERENTIAL FEED: Even with easily stretched fabrics such as knits and georgette, create beautifully sewn finishes by adjusting the differential feed. Adjustments can even be made while sewing. BEAUTIFUL SHARP CURVE: The distance between the needle and knife is 9.95mm (conventional model: 15.5mm), allowing you to sew beautiful inside curves. UPPER LOOPER CONVERTER 2-/3- THREAD CONVERSION: Switch to 2-Thread sewing simply by pushing the 2-/3- thread changeover attachment to the left, making this operation even easier. WIDE THROAT AREA: The height of the throat is 72.4mm. Due to this height, the usability of the work space improved infinitely. QUIET OPERATION: The sound reducing design minimizes the operating noise and the unit sews with less vibration. LED SEWING LIGHT: The needle area is brightly illuminated. The long-life, energy-efficient and eco-friendly light will not heat up, even after a long period of use. WASTE COLLECTOR: Provided as a standard accessory, the waste collector catches cut-off fabric and is useful for keeping the area tidy. CONVENIENT THREADING WITH THE EASY THREADER: Using the new easy threader feature, easily thread the machine from the threading hole tot he looper with the power of a strong whoosh of air sent from the electric motor. This amazing function dramatically alters upper and lower looper threading. AUTOMATIC NEEDLE THREADER: Quickly thread the needle! With the automatic needle threader, the needle is threaded in 3 easy steps.
feature_bullets: Effortless air powered threading with the push of a button
Safety feature preventing operation when the presser foot is upper position or the cover is open

Included Accessories: Presser foot Large screwdriver Small screwdriver Spare lower knife Spool caps Oiler Thread nets Vinyl cover Needle pack Tweezer Brush & needle inserter Needle threader Guide bar 2/3 thread selector Instruction Manual Accessory pouch Foot control & power cord.

US Warranty: 5 Years Mechanical (this excludes "consumable parts" such as loopers, feed dogs, knife blades, bulbs, lamps, presser feet, needles and belts) 2 Years Electrical (motors, light assembly, wiring, switches, circuit boards and speed control). 90 Days Adjustments on defects in material or workmanship.
